column1: #FORMAT=WebAnno TSV 3.2
#T_SP=de.tudarmstadt.ukp.dkpro.core.api.ner.type.NamedEntity|identifier|value
#T_CH=de.tudarmstadt.ukp.dkpro.core.api.coref.type.CoreferenceLink|referenceRelation|referenceType
#Text=Suyin says : " Opal has decided to go to the Northern Air Temple .
#Text=I 'm glad she was honest with me .
#Text=I want her to do what makes her happy .
#Text=Mom gave us too much freedom , but I feel like I made the mistake of giving Opal too little .
#Text=I think it 's about time I let her choose her own way .
#Text=I 'm sorry I gave you such a hard time when we were younger .
#Text=I ca n't imagine what my life would 've been like if Mom had n't sent me away , if I had stayed in the city ... " Lin says : " You 'd probably be in prison .
#Text=" Suyin says : " You 're probably right .
#Text=Mako told me that you 're an excellent police chief .
#Text=Republic City is lucky to have you .
#Text=I know Mom is proud .
#Text=Can we move on ?
#Text=I 'd love for you to be part of my life again .
#Text=There 's plenty of space in the house , and the kids would love having their aunt around .
#Text=I do need a new co-director for my new dance performance .
#Text=" Lin says : " Whoa !
#Text=Slow it down .
#Text=How about for now , I just promise not to show up at your house and attack you again ?
#Text=" Suyin says : " Deal !
#Text="
